word_group.brief_definition: 舒适的环境；舒服的环境

bilingual.source: Move the boy to a more comfortable place.
bilingual.target: 把男孩移到更舒适的地方。

bilingual.source: This is the most comfortable way to travel.
bilingual.target: 这是最舒适的旅行方式。

bilingual.source: But I think Moon Theater has the most comfortable seats.
bilingual.target: 但我认为月亮剧院有最舒适的座椅。

bilingual.source: Just get some comfortable sports clothes and good running shoes.
bilingual.target: 只需准备一些舒适的运动服和好的跑鞋。

bilingual.source: It is the most interesting and also the most comfortable way.
bilingual.target: 这是最有趣也是最舒适的方式。

bilingual.source: It's the most comfortable way, but it's also the most expensive.
bilingual.target: 这是最舒适的方式，但也是最贵的。

list.abstract: 《Comfortable》是阿莱西娅 卡拉演唱的一首歌曲，由Alessia Caracciolo、Ernest Wilson、Steve Wyreman、Nate Mercereau作词作曲，于2018年11月30日发行。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh great. Wow. Yeah, it's comfortable. Yeah?
yingyinNormal.zh: 太好了。很舒服。

yingyinNormal.en: Agent Romanoff is comfortable with everything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗曼诺夫特工没下限，她愿意做。

yingyinNormal.en: How dare you? Unless you're comfortable with that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你怎么能这么说，只要你同意就行啦。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know. I guess I feel comfortable. I'm glad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不知道，大概是和你说话感觉很舒服吧。我很高兴。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you comfortable? Reasonably. You scared me to death.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还舒服吗？还行，你把我吓坏了。

yingyinNormal.en: So, are you experiencing any discomfort? No. I'm very comfortable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你觉得不舒服吗？不，我非常舒服。

yingyinNormal.en: I feel very comfortable around you. I feel very comfortable around you, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 和你呆在一起很舒服。我也有同感。

yingyinNormal.en: So, is that a yes? Not yet. I... How will I learn if I'm comfortable living with Amy or just comfortable because I'm in my own apartment?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你同意了吗？还没呢，，我...我如何能确定我是跟艾米相住愉快还是因为只是在自己家里待得舒服呢？

yingyinNormal.en: I don't think I'd be comfortable with any of my old lovers there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我找旧情人去一定会觉得别扭。

yingyinNormal.en: You wanna go in the bedroom? It's a little more comfortable. Sure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要不要进卧房去？比较舒服一点。当然。好。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm comfortable in a suit, if it's okay. No, it's fine. Old school.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只是，我还是穿西装比较舒服，如果可以的话。没事，这样就行，学院派。

yingyinNormal.en: Not necessary. Penny and I are perfectly comfortable sharing a bed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不用的，我跟佩妮完全不介意睡一张床。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, I didn't want you doing anything you weren't comfortable with.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，我没想让你做你觉得超过底线的事。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, not yet. I'm not comfortable being placed ahead of His Lordship.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还没有，被放到比老爷优先的位置，这让我不舒服。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, I got to shower. You guys, make yourselves comfortable. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的，我得去洗澡了，你们自己好好玩吧。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: All right. Don't get too comfortable there, because I'm back in two weeks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，别让你自己太舒服，因为我两个星期之后就回来了。

yingyinNormal.en: Those look, comfortable. They are. Thank you for saving the day back there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 鞋子看起来,很舒服。是的。谢谢你让我脱离了这无聊的派对。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not comfortable with the dynamic we've established. What dynamic is that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不喜欢我们现在的这种关系。什么关系？

yingyinNormal.en: And I have to tell you, I became pretty comfortable with that level of success.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我得承认，这样的成功让我感觉非常好。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't feel comfortable letting my kids play out here. Our kids. Paul, please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这害得我不放心让我的孩子在外面玩。是我们的孩子。保罗，拜托。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 舒适；自在；安慰；慰藉；温暖的盖被；安逸；享受；带来舒适安逸的事物；给予安慰（或减轻困难）的人

examination_example.sentence: Most people are not <highlight>comfortable</highlight> holding eye contact with strangers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数人对于和陌生人进行眼神交流都感到不太自在。

examination_example.sentence: Looking back, he is struck that his parents could provide a <highlight>comfortable</highlight> life for their children even though neither had completed college when he was young.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 回想起来，令他感到震惊的是，尽管在他小的时候，他的父母没能完成大学学业，但他们却能够给孩子提供舒适的生活。

examination_example.sentence: Soon you'll feel <highlight>comfortable</highlight> asking if they've any knuckles of ham for soups and stews, or beef bones, chicken carcasses and fish heads for stock.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很快，你会很自在地问他们是否有可以用来炖汤或炖菜的火腿，或是用来熬高汤的牛骨、鸡肉或鱼头。

sense_info_list.en: having enough money to buy what you want without worrying about the cost

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en:
feeling physically relaxed in a pleasant way; warm enough, without pain, or others;
making you feel physically relaxed; pleasant to wear, sit on, or others
sense_info_list.zh: 舒服的; 使人舒服的; 舒适的

sense_info_list.en: having enough money to buy what you want without worrying about the cost
quite large; allowing you to win easily
sense_info_list.zh: 相当大的; 轻松取胜的

examination_example.sentence: With continuing advances in individual genome(基因组)sequencing and the advent of personalized medicine, more non-scientists will need to be <highlight>comfortable</highlight> analyzing complex scientific information.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着个人基因组测序的不断进步和个性化医学的出现，更多的非科学家将会轻松分析复杂的科学信息。

sense_info_list.en: confident and not worried or afraid

adj. 令人舒适的；令人放松的；足够的；轻松的；宽裕的；舒坦的；小康的；舒服的；放松的；舒畅的

sense_info_list.en:
feeling physically relaxed in a pleasant way; warm enough; without pain; or others; 
making you feel physically relaxed; pleasant to wear; sit on; or others
sense_info_list.zh: 舒服的; 使人舒服的; 舒适的

examination_example.sentence: For example, mobile robots have been programmed to keep a <highlight>comfortable</highlight> distance from humans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，移动机器人已经被编程为与人类保持舒适的距离。

examination_example.sentence: Their life was much more <highlight>comfortable</highlight> than that of today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们以前的生活比现如今的舒适多了。

sense_info_list.en: having enough money to buy what you want without worrying about the cost

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: There was a nice kitchen and a <highlight>comfortable</highlight> bed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一间很好的厨房和一张舒服的床。

examination_example.sentence: If we stay at home, it is <highlight>comfortable</highlight> and there is no need to spend money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 家里很舒服，如果我们待在家里，就无需花钱。

examination_example.sentence: Firstly, please do remember to put on some <highlight>comfortable</highlight> shoes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，请记得穿上一些舒适的鞋子。

sense_info_list.en: having enough money to buy what you want without worrying about the cost

exam_freq_info.chinese: 舒适的; 使人舒服的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 舒服地；充裕地；安乐地
adj. 令人舒适的；令人放松的；足够的；轻松的；宽裕的；舒坦的；小康的；舒服的；放松的；舒畅的

word_family.mean: n. 舒适；自在；安慰；慰藉；温暖的盖被；安逸；享受；带来舒适安逸的事物；给予安慰（或减轻困难）的人

sense_info_list.zh: 舒适的; 使人舒服的

examination_example.sentence: All you need for naming, some <highlight>comfortable</highlight> clothes and a pair of sports shoes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 命名所需的一切，一些舒适的衣服和一双运动鞋。

examination_example.sentence: And for a cowboy, job satisfaction doesn't come from the money or a <highlight>comfortable</highlight> office.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于一个牛仔来说，工作的满足感并不来自金钱或舒适的办公室。

examination_example.sentence: Although rich, Xu avoided <highlight>comfortable</highlight> travel, preferring to go almost everywhere on foot.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管很富有，徐还是避免舒适的旅行，宁愿步行去几乎所有的地方。

examination_example.sentence: The more you talk to them, the more <highlight>comfortable</highlight> they will feel when they give you their opinions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你和他们谈得越多，他们给你意见的时候就越放松。

examination_example.sentence: In other words, parents have to be <highlight>comfortable</highlight> with the idea of allowing kids to fail as part of the learning goal．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说，作为学习目标的一部分，父母必须接受让孩子失败的想法。
